title: Visual Heritage in the Digital Age
description:
2013 | 378 Pages | ISBN: 1447155343 | PDF | 11 MB

Heritage is everywhere, and an understanding of our past is increasingly critical to the understanding of our contemporary cultural context and place in global society. 

Visual Heritage in the Digital Age presents the state-of-the-art in the application of digital technologies to heritage studies, with the chapters collectively demonstrating the ways in which current developments are liberating the study, conservation and management of the past.
